paminilla sambandhawa parikshana pawathwu rahas polisiye wishesha wimarshana eekakaye polis parikshaka ranjith munasinha mahatha athulu niladharin kandayamak wisin shri lankawata pamina sitina ema sakakaru mahanuwaradi athadanguwata ganna ladi.sakakaru sambandhawa wadiduratath parikshana pawathwima sandaha aarakshaka lekamwarayagen randawum niyoga labagena athi bawa, sakakaru athireka mahesthrathwaraya wetha idiripath karamin rahas polisiya pawasiya.ema randawum niyoga matha randawa sakakaru sambandhawa wadiduratath parikshana pawathwimata awasara labadena lesatada rahas polisiya athireka mahesthrathwarayagen thawaduratath illa sitiyeya.ee anuwa masaka kalayak sakakaru randawum niyoga matha randawa thaba wadidura parikshana pawathwimata rahas polisiyata awasara labini..
